General.Name: PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk
General.Description: PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services to cooperatives in Indonesia. It offers individual and business savings accounts, current accounts, and deposits; loans; and credit and debit cards. The company also provides wealth management, syndication, custody, and e- banking services. It operates through a network of branches, sub-branches, and functional offices, as well as ATMs. It operates in Jakarta, Bogor, Tangerang, Bekasi, Java, Sumatera, Kalimantan, and Internationally. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Bukopin Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk in February 2021. PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank KB Bukopin Tbk operates as a subsidiary of KB Kookmin Bank.
